text: The Marshall Mathers LP is the third studio album by American rapper, Eminem. The Marshall Mathers LP was released on May 23, 2000 and was produced by Dr. Dre, Mel-Man, Bass Brothers, Eminem and The 45 King. The Marshall Mathers LP 2, the sequel to The Marshall Mathers LP, was released on November 5, 2013. == Track listing == Credits adapted from the album's liner notes and Tidal Notes * signifies a co-producer * Dina Rae goes uncredited as being featured * signifies a remixer ==Reception== It was widely praised by music and hip-hop critics, and is considered one of the greatest hip hop albums of all time. The album was given 5 out of 5 stars by Allmusic/ ==References== Category:2000 albums Category:Eminem albums Category:Hip hop albums Category:Comedy hip hop albums Category:Aftermath Entertainment albums Category:Interscope Records albums
title: The Marshall Mathers LP
